description: Try our easy to follow Gado Gado Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Gado Gado Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potatoes in a small pan of boiling water for 8 minutes or until just tender. Remove with a slotted spoon and cool. Add eggs to pan and cook for 5 minutes or until cooked to your liking. Cool and peel (see note). Add beans and cook for 3 minutes or until tender. Drain and refresh.
Layer cabbage into a container. Slice potato and egg and arrange over cabbage with beans and shoots. Garnish with shallots and coriander.

To make sauce, place peanut butter, 5 tbs warm water, soy sauce and chilli into a small sealable container. Stir well until smooth and serve over salad (see note). Note: The egg can be transported in its shell and the sauce can be placed in a separate container, so salad stays crisp.
